ActAn Act to amend the Criminal Code (firearms) and the Firearms Act
PrecisOrder fixing August 15, 2003 as the date on which subsection 2(2), sections 3 to 7, 10 to 12, 22 and 24, subsection 40(1) and sections 43, 52, 53 and 55 of that Act [Bill C-10A] shall COME INTO FORCE.
